DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication whether a pre-specified procedure (PRTRT) happened when information about the occurrence of a specific intervention is solicited.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure._An indication or description of a procedure occurrence.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if [specific procedure] was performed by checking Yes or No.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PROCCUR
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. If the response was not asked or answered, populate the SDTMIG variable PRSTAT with "NOT DONE".

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: PROCCUR is used to report the occurrence of a pre-specific procedures. PROCCUR is not used for spontaneously free text reported procedures. The site should be able to indicate that the response was not asked or answered.

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.12.12 AQTs added per ticket request CADSR0003185. ak 12/12/23 Added 4 alt OIDs, and 5 AQTS for CCTG ticket number CADSR0003179 cjl; 2023.12.6 Alt SN added per ticket request CADSR0003168. ak 2023.11.8 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0003057. ak 11/7/23 Added AQT and alt OID for CCTG for ticket number CADSR0003018 cjl; 2023.7.17 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002610. ak 2023.5.22 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002449. ak 3/10/23 added AQT for COG ticket request CADSR0002146 cjl; 2023.1.19 Alt SN added per ticket request. ak 11/9/22 added AQT for ticket number CADSR0001669 cjl; 10/19/22 added 3 alt name, 6 AQT, classification for CTEP CDISC Harmonization project cjl; 5/31/22 added AQT and alt name OID, CCTG added cjl
